Text: Swan Districts Football Club: The club is based at Bassendean Oval, in Bassendean, an eastern suburb of Perth, Western Australia.

Triplets:
<Swan Districts Football Club
2:
--------------------
Text: Swan Districts Football Club:  The club was formed in 1932, and joined the then-Western Australian National Football League (WANFL) in 1934, acting as a successor to the Midland Junction Football Club, which had disbanded during World War I, in the Perth Hills region.
Triplets:<Swan Districts Football Club
